function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Food trucks adapting service strategies during pandemic","Impact":"Risk of spreading contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, maintaining physical distance, and using protective equipment","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, mobile ordering apps, and digital menus","People":"Customers, food truck employees, family members, friends, and business owners","Owner":"Food truck owners, service marketers, and public health authorities"}]}
